sources.title: Weather Girl | FULL MOVIE | Dramedy
sources.description:
Succumbing to the stresses of work and romance, a Seattle morning weather anchor melts down live on air. Closing in on forty, she is now unemployed, lacks career prospects and must cope with her cheating boyfriend.

#comedy #drama #movie #freemoviesonline #fullmoviefree #weather #reporter #leadingwomen #women #career #boyfriend #boy #girl #cheating #relationships #seattle

metadata.Plot: Sylvia, approaching 35, is the "sassy weather girl" at a Seattle TV station. On a live broadcast, she castigates her boyfriend Dale (who's the show's anchorman) for sleeping with his co-anchor; then she quits. She'd been living with Dale, who explains himself by saying she's cold, so she moves in temporarily with her younger brother Walt. His neighbor Byron, a computer programmer, is always in Walt's flat working. While Sylvia looks for a job, Byron offers himself as a no-strings-attached rebound-sex partner, with the condition that she not tell Walt. How will she respond, and what about finding work, living with her brother, sorting things out with Dale, and being cold?
metadata.Actors: Tricia O'Kelley, Patrick J. Adams, Ryan Devlin
